nodes.text: The South Work Yard was part of Jenith's spaceport during the Republic Dark Age. During the Raid on Chelloa, Gorlan Palladane and his fellow workers were working there. They were about to be executed by a squad of Daimanate Sith troopers when the Jedi Knight Kerra Holt intervened and immobilized the attackers. The South Work Yard survived the damage inflicted by Sith Lord Odion's kinetic corruptor.
